lines.text: This is not a toothpick, okay? It's an Australian chewing stick. See, I know other countries in Europe!
How do you feel?
Like ten bucks.
True love cannot be found where it does not truly exist, nor can it be hidden where it truly does.
You know that I hadn't dated for two years before you introduced me to Max?
I didn't realize that, no.

My whole life had been my work. I'd gone through a heartbreak as well, but I now understand it was just my ego. 'Cause looking back, I don't... I don't think I really loved him. But I cried when I realized that he didn't love me.
So the $64,000 question is, how do you know beforehand that you're with the wrong person so you can avoid having them wreak havoc on a large portion of your life?
I don't think you do know until you meet the right person, 'cause then you just... you just... you just feel something that you know you've never felt before.
[on Jay putting an end to Max's hedonistic lifestyle]
I mean, Max, you don't wanna become that fourty-year-old guy who's still out at the clubs with the silk shirt and gold chains trying to pick up on college girls, do you?
Of course not, Jay... at forty, I wanna be the bald guy with a pony-tail and a Harley trying to pick up High School girls.
You're an idiot.
Yet you're the one in therapy.
You're the one who SHOULD be.
Maybe you can get me in! I've always wanted to pay a hundred bucks an hour to talk myself out of being happy.
[Speaking about a large book]
So read it then.
Read it? I can barely lift it!
It's hard to tell how many emotions were real and how many were manufactured just to get the other person to bring over more pot.
I thought we agreed not to set each other up anymore.
No, I agreed not to let you set me up anymore after that girl who you said was perfect for me tied me up and came out with that hood and cane and offered to beat the shit out of me.
Why would I set you up with some girl that I banged?
Share the wealth, brother.
I'm not gonna depress myself, and sit in my room all night listening to Barry Manilow records.
Hey, that was a radio special!
Four shots, vodka.
You look like shit.
Yeah... I'm aware of that.

[to Max]
I have other depressions that don't involve you.
He's drunk, he's been drinking an awful lot lately.
He's right!
You're an idiot.
You're the one in therapy!

[to Max]
In some bizarre circles you are a celebrity.

[to Max]
I didn't know that dating Windy Weathers was a real attention getter.
Jay?
Yeah?
That girl is not for you.
I know... I just keep thinking, what if I missed out on a girl who is?
Ever have sex in a Mercedes? Convertible.
You stick with the Virgin Mary, and remember, if you fuck it up again, you're back to Italy doing another romance novel.
You know each other less than 24 hours. You have pet names?
Now I know in this little three week Love Boat episode of yours, you think you've come to know what love is. But, you know what? I don't know that you have.
She thinks I'm uncomfortable around her now, which I am, because of your stupid test.
Don't you know, that's what all us models do is get coked and have orgies.
